column2: "ARKS members these days! So many of them neglect to upgrade their weapons and armor. We shouldn't let them slack off like that, if you ask me."
"Going into battle without upgrading the weapons you entrust your life to... Well, that's just foolish."
"What about you? Maybe you ought to go do some upgrades, while we're on the subject."
"Upgrade what? Your weapons and armor! Haven't you been listening? You'd best pay attention. Now go use your Grinder at the Item Lab."
"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket science. Now go put my mind at ease by making some upgrades, all right?"

"New-Type Weapons can be enhanced by Grinding them at the Item Lab.

New-Type weapons use other weapons as material, consuming them to gain \"Grind EXP\".

When the Grind EXP gauge fills, the weapon's Grind Value rises and it becomes stronger."

"When upgrading New-Type items, you need the following materials:
・Up to 5 other weapons to use as material
・Grinders
・Meseta"

"Some weapons may give bonus Grind EXP when used as material.
・Material Bonus:
Materials with the same category, rarity and name as the item you're upgrading.
・Reinforcement Bonus
Materials that have been grinded to +1 or higher"

"When you grind a New-Type weapon, the result can be either a Success or a Great Success.

A Great Success awards the weapon even more Grind EXP than usual.

※Grinding New-Type weapons cannot fail."
